description.full: Equal parts comic and commentary, Penny Arcade releases three strips each week focusing on games and the game industry. Started by Gabe and Tycho in 1998, the site has grown to be the largest comic on the Internet with over 3.5 million readers worldwide. In 2003, the pair has started their own game-industry charity, Child’s Play (http://www.childsplaycharity.org), which since its inception has raised over $1,200,000 in cash and toys for sick children across the globe. In 2004, Penny Arcade launched PAX (the Penny Arcade Expo), a gaming festival held in Seattle every fall which has since become the largest show of its kind. (http://www.pennyarcadeexpo.com)  Penny Arcade is based in Seattle, Washington and can be found at www.penny-arcade.com.
